definition: Nujiang river of south Tibet and northwest Yunnan, the upper reaches of Salween river 薩爾溫江|萨尔温江, forming border of Myanmar and Thailand
four types of human emotions, namely: happiness 歡喜|欢喜[huan1 xi3], anger 憤怒|愤怒[fen4 nu4], sorrow 悲哀[bei1 ai1] and joy 快樂|快乐[kuai4 le4]
to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
unable to restrain one's anger (idiom); in a towering rage

sentences.english: But God was very angry when he went, and the angel of the Lord stood in the road to oppose him.
sentences.chinese: 神因他去就發了怒，耶和華的使者站在路上敵擋他。

sentences.english: Do you want to wake the dragon, you stupid little whore?
sentences.chinese: 你想喚醒真龍之怒嗎，你這個小賤貨？

sentences.english: Achieved Vicious Gladiator title. Achieved Ruthle Gladiator title.
sentences.chinese: 獲得頭銜“暴藍田墨玉怒角鬥士”。

sentences.english: Hard-to-readfonts are a fast way to get your resume on the bottom of any HRmanager’s stack.
sentences.chinese: 簡歷上難讀的字體是最容易讓人事經理髮怒的一件事。

sentences.english: Having been neglected for all that time, Bamboo was angry as well as hungry.
sentences.chinese: 這段時間一直沒人理它，它又餓又怒。

sentences.english: At the news he was beside himself with anger.
sentences.chinese: 聽了這個消息他慣怒得幾乎發狂。

sentences.english: Angry to fly, throw department news of department all at programmer, if the gull enters the beach.
sentences.chinese: 怒而飛，投司部之訊於程序員衆，若鷗入灘。

sentences.english: The balls represent the dubious (double?) nature of this energy behind either the unchecked anger or pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 這三個球代表了不受箝制的怒與樂背後矛盾的力量。

sentences.english: The second feature of this setup is the interaction of pain suppression and Shamanistic rage.
sentences.chinese: 第二個好處是痛苦壓制和薩滿之怒的配合使用。

sentences.english: Pharaoh was angry with his two officers, the chief of butlers , and the chief of bakers.
sentences.chinese: 法郎於是對那兩個內臣，司酒長和司廚長髮了怒。

sentences.english: BaiLing dissatisfaction jasper come hell down her anger after her away.
sentences.chinese: 柏齡不滿碧玉到來大吵大鬧，怒摑她後將她趕走。

sentences.english: A Jedi shall not know Anger.
Second is the spirited imagination intrinsic makings and the external imposing manner.
sentences.chinese: 二是鬱怒激昂的意象內在氣質和外在氣勢。

sentences.english: Shocked and outraged, she jumps up and slaps him hard.
sentences.chinese: 這位女士又驚又怒，一下跳起來恨恨地給了他一耳光。

sentences.english: Janny: My husband bursted into a fury this morning.
Critics howl that young children lack the maturity to cope with social networks.
sentences.chinese: 評論家們怒嚎，小孩子們太嫩，對付不了社交網絡。

definition: to fly into a rage/to rage violently
to flip out/to act out violently
to rain curses (on sb)/to let sb have it/to bawl sb out
unable to restrain one's anger (idiom); in a towering rage
to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
stamp with fury/fly into a rage
